page.title: 13Weston Turville Shop
page.content: My Mum and Dad's employment is the local shop.They get up every morning at 5.30a.m,but on Sundays they get up at 6.30a.m. When they have got up they mark up the papers for the paperboys. The sort of people who come in the shop,come in at different times,and they stick to a timetable.At 7.30a.m. all the workmen come in to buy newspapers and cigarettes.At 8.30a.m the children come in for sweets for their packed lunches.At 9.00a.m all the mums come in from seeing their children off to school.At 9.30 a.m and onwards mums,old people,and people out of work come in.At 4.00p.m. school children and mums appear again. The house we live in is above the shop.It's like any other house,but you have to walk up two flights of stairs instead of one.
